page.title: 10TYPES OF HOUSES IN CARNFIRTH
page.content: We counted over 1,300 houses in Carnforth. 10.34% are Detached Bungalows. 1.53% are Semi-Detached Bungalows. 6.51% are Flats. 50.20% are Terraced Houses. 6.90% are Detached Houses. 24.52% are Semi-Detached Houses. The large{Council Estate}consists mainly of semi-detached houses with some flats. The newest estate is the {Whelmar Estate}of private det. houses and bungalows.{North Road,}the oldest road, used to be the main road and is mainly terraced cottages. Carnforth grew quickly with the coming of the {Ironworks}and the{Railway,}which probably accounts for the large number of terraced houses. The oldest houses in Carnforth are{10 Lower North Road {(1688-formerly Miller's Lane)}and{Hagg {House}built in{1638.}
